DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Gintuit ( TM ) Oral Soft Tissue Regeneration
DOC.criteria: Subject least 18 year age 70 year age . Subject least two nonadjacent teeth contralateral quadrant jaw insufficient zone ( < = 1mm ) attach gingiva require soft tissue grafting . ( 13 teeth may treat . In case adjacent teeth require grafting , one tooth site act test control tooth , teeth get treatment ) . Root coverage desire time graft . Females childbearing potential must document negative urine pregnancy test . Subjects must read , understood sign institutional review board ( IRB ) approve Informed Consent Form . Subjects must able willing follow study procedure instruction . Subject class III recession presence shallow vestibule class IV recession . Subject vestibule depth le 7mm base recession . Subject systemic condition could compromise wound heal preclude periodontal surgery ( i.e. , diabetes mellitus , cancer , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , bone metabolic disease ) . Subject currently receive receive within two month prior study entry , systemic corticosteroid , immunosuppressive agent , radiation therapy , and/or chemotherapy could compromise wound heal preclude periodontal surgery . Subject presence acute infectious lesion area intend surgery . Subject use tobacco product within 3 month . Subject take intramuscular intravenous bisphosphonates . Subject molar teeth suitable soft tissue graft . Subject teeth Miller Grade 2 high mobility . Subject know hypersensitivity bovine collagen and/or iodine ( shellfish allergy ) . Subject receive investigational drug biological/bioactive treatment within 30 day prior study enrollment ( medical dental ) . Subject previously treat Gintuit , Dermagraft skin graft target site ( ) immediately adjacent teeth . Subject , opinion investigator , reason list , able complete study per protocol .
